refnamediv.refpurpose: clears the cache for a specific template

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If you have multiple caches for a template, you can clear a specific cache by supplying the cache_id as the second parameter. You can also pass a $compile_id as a third parameter. You can "group" templates together so they can be removed as a group. See the caching section for more information. As an optional fourth parameter, you can supply a minimum age in seconds the cache file must be before it will get cleared.

example.title: clear_cache()
example.programlisting:
<?php
// clear the cache for a template
$smarty->clear_cache('index.tpl');

// clear the cache for a particular cache id in an multiple-cache template
$smarty->clear_cache('index.tpl', 'CACHEID');
?>
